post:
I have a Blesta v3 owned unbranded license that I purchased, but I ended up going with WHMCS instead of Blesta. Since I have no use for the Blesta license I'm selling it.

I'm looking for $125 through PayPal or Dwolla. Please reply or send me a private message if you are interested.

It includes nearly one year of support and updates. 

Here's proof of the license:
